Package de.indisopht.guice.groovy

Class Summary
GroovyGuice Fluent API for configuring the environment of Modules with bindings to Groovy source files
Basic Usage:
Module groovyGuiceModule = GroovyGuice .create() .addClasspath(classpath) .build(); Guice.createInjector(myModule, groovyGuiceModule);
Example bindings:
Binding a groovy class to a java interface bind(TestInterface.class).toProvider(new GroovyProvider<TestInterface>("TestClass"){}); Binding grovvy code inside a string to a java class bind(MyClass.class).to(new GroovyProvider<MyClass>("import a.b.c; class B extends MyClass { }"){}); Binding a grovvy script inside a string bind(Script.class).toProvider(new GroovyProvider<Script>("println('groovy hello'); 'groovy'"){}); Binding a grovvy script from a file bind(Script.class).toProvider(new GroovyProvider<Script>("TestScript"){});
GroovyGuice.GroovyModuleBuilderInstance Building Block of Fluent API
GroovyGuice.ScriptBindConfig Building Block of Fluent API for binding Scripts on the fly.
GroovyProvider<T> Provider implementation for Groovy integration
